# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses the column at the specified position.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(column: Int) -> SIMD4<Float> { get set }
```

## Element Access

- **subscript(_:_:)**: Accesses the element at the specified position.

items.description: Accesses the element at the specified position.
items.name: subscript(_:_:)
